description: This version of the  Person Pouting emoji has the  Light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Pale Skin Tone on supported platform
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the light-skinned person pouting emoji conveys a subtle yet distinct expression of displeasure, rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and a touch of realistic lighting. The downturned mouth and slightly furrowed brow are depicted with smooth gradients, hinting at a mild sulk or disappointment. This emoji is perfect for communicating a gentle grievance or a moment of playful discontent within your Apple device's text conversations.
